tooltip.scintilla.t0nutrition: About as filling as a cookie... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t1nutrition: About as filling as an apple... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t2nutrition: About as filling as cooked chicken... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t3nutrition: About as filling as a pumpkin pie... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t4nutrition: About as filling as rabbit stew... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t0saturation: About as healthy as a cake slice... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t1saturation: About as healthy as a melon slice... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t2saturation: About as healthy as bread... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t3saturation: About as healthy as cooked steak... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t4saturation: More healthy than a golden carrot... somehow.
tooltip.scintilla.t0durability: Would make some good bottles for holding Scintilla.
tooltip.scintilla.t1durability: Seems to have some very minor space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t2durability: Seems to have some small space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t3durability: Seems to have some decent space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t4durability: Seems to have some powerful space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t5durability: Seems to have some extremely powerful space warping abilities. It's... difficult to hold.
tooltip.scintilla.shatterglass_guide: §8To obtain Shatterglass, smash any placed §dStained Glass Block §8with a §cBrick§8!§r
scintilla.advancements.root.title: Path to Scintilla
scintilla.advancements.root.description: A sweet treat from from the §dWeave of Noxlyte§a, fit for plushkin of any kind!
scintilla.advancements.smash_glass.title: Rimeless Reason
scintilla.advancements.smash_glass.descr: Smash any placed stained glass block with a brick to obtain Shatterglass.
scintilla.advancements.craft_first_scint: Craft your first bottle of Scintilla.
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_1.title: Patterns to Live In
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_1.descript: Upgrade the Hunger restoration of your Scintilla to level 2 using eight Diamond Dust.
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_1.title: A Fustian Mystery
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_1.descript: Upgrade the Saturation restoration of your Scintilla to level 2 using eight Crushed Amethyst.
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_1.title: Trading with Paper Leaves
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_1.descript: Upgrade the Capacity of your Scintilla bottle to level 2 using any Emerald Bottle, no dye needed.
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_2.title: A Hero by Any Other Color
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_2.descript: Upgrade the Hunger restoration of your Scintilla to level 3 using eight Quartz Silica Dust.
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_2.title: Harrowing Dawn Spellcasting
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_2.descript: Upgrade the Saturation restoration of your Scintilla to level 3 using eight Blaze Ash.
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_2.title: One Map to Q'tenso, Please
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_2.descript: Upgrade the Capacity of your Scintilla bottle to level 3 using any Pearlescent Bottle, no dye needed.
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_3.title: Silence in the Old Capital
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_3.descript: Upgrade the Hunger restoration of your Scintilla to level 4 using eight Echoic Earth.
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_3.title: On Sands of Black and White
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_3.descript: Upgrade the Saturation restoration of your Scintilla to level 4 using eight Salt of the Sea.
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_3.title: Between the 3rd and 4th Wall
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_3.descript: Upgrade the Capacity of your Scintilla bottle to level 4 using any Ender or Eye Bottle, no dye needed.
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_4.title: Tacet Nox, Atrament Skies
scintilla.advancements.nut_up_4.descript: Upgrade the Hunger restoration of your Scintilla to max level using eight Nether Stardust.
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_4.title: The Herringbone Special
scintilla.advancements.sat_up_4.descript: Upgrade the Saturation restoration of your Scintilla to max level using eight Prismarine Powder.
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_4.title: A Rain that Never Ends
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_4.descript: Upgrade the Capacity of your Scintilla bottle to level 5 using any Crystalline Bottle, no dye needed.
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_5.title: Via Ultima
scintilla.advancements.cap_up_5.descript: Upgrade the Capacity of your Scintilla bottle to max level using any Final Bottle, no dye needed.
scintilla.advancements.uncommon.title: Fit for a Claw of Scintilla
scintilla.advancements.uncommon.descript: Upgrade your Scintilla beyond common levels.
scintilla.advancements.rare.title: Dance on Shatterglass Dunes
scintilla.advancements.rare.description: Upgrade your Scintilla until it nears perfection.
scintilla.advancements.epic.title: Tomorrow, Tomorrow
scintilla.advancements.glamour.title: Not What It Seams
scintilla.advancements.glamour.descripti: Using dye in your crafting table, you can change your Scintilla visually without changing its stats. Try using redstone, glowstone, or gunpowder as a cosmetic!
scintilla.advancements.depletion_challen: Run out of Scintilla with a Final Bottle.
tetra.module.sword/needle_blade.name: Needle
tetra.module.sword/needle_blade.descript:
A replica of a §fGrand Relic§r from the semifictional §dWeave of Noxlyte§r.
 
Has bizarre properties as a result of its semifictional nature.
tetra/schematic/sword/needle_blade.name: Lovestitch
tetra/schematic/sword/needle_blade.descr:
Replace the current sword blade with a facsimile of Lovestitch using semifictional smithing techniques.
 
Material §fstat§r increases §fsomething?§r.
